: Test the TUI multi-session management.

Function Documentation

TestCase_BC0200_OpenSessionFromTA1AndTA2 (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
078a0000000000000000000000000000 078a0000000000000000000000000001
Pre Conditions:
Open TA1 & TA2 Session ,
Focus:
TA1 open TUI session then TA2 open TUI session
Test Steps:
Call tlApiTuiOpenSession from TA1 then call tlApiTuiOpenSession from TA2
Verification:
Check TA2 result must be E_TLAPI_TUI_BUSY
Post Conditions:
Close TA1 & TA2 Session
Manual Execution:
No

Yes

Yes

TestCase_GC0201_OpenSessionCloseSessionFromTA1ThenOpenSessionTA2 (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
078a0000000000000000000000000000 078a0000000000000000000000000001
Pre Conditions:
Open TA1 & TA2 Session ,
Focus:
TA1 open TUI session, TA1 close TUI session, then TA2 open TUI session
Test Steps:
Call tlApiTuiOpenSession then tlApiTuiCloseSession from TA1 and call tlApiTuiOpenSession from TA2
Verification:
Check TA2 result must be RET_OK
Post Conditions:
Close TA1 & TA2 Session

No

078a0000000000000000000000000000 078a0000000000000000000000000001

TA1 open TUI session, TA2 call SetImage
